column6: Welcome to our place, We are close to DFW Airport (10 mins) and Love Field (25 mins) Irving has many fine restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, and nightlife. Irving is traversed by numerous highways. The Airport Freeway, TX- 183, Interstate 635 , Highway 114 and the President George Bush Turnpike, The Las Colinas area is centered near the intersection of 114 and the Bush turnpike.
